Edges-Tinkerer -- Female Human Seasoned Tinkerer
Attributes (8 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d4 Strength: d6 Vigor: d10
Skills (12 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d6 Stealth: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Survival: (sma) d4
Healing: (sma) d4 Repair: (sma) d10 Weird Science: (sma) d6
Intimidation: (spi) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Skill Notes:
Jingoistic: -2 Persuasion (characters from other cultures)
Jinx: May disable any mechanical device with a successful Repair
Size: 0
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 6; Edge: 6
Features
Edges (4 points): Arcane Background (Tinkerer); Construct Familiar; Gadgeteer; Tinkerer's Armor Hindrances: Habit; Jingoistic; Obligation; Talisman Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Tinkerer): Has Jinx and Tools features
Habit: Has an irritating but harmless compulsion
Obligation: Has a responsibility that occupies 20 hr/wk
Combat
Parry: 3 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Cloak With Hood Shield: Small Shield Weapons: Hook Sword (d6+d6 AP 1); Morningstar (d6+d6); Scythe (d6+d6); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Jingoistic: Command edges do not effect allies from other cultures
Tinkerer's Armor: Successful Repair reduces armor Strength requirement by 1 die type and gains one of: +2 melee damage and free Strength reroll; +2 chest and back Armor; or dbl jump distance and +4 Pace/Wound has 50% chance of disabling armor
Arcana
Power Count: 2 Power Points: 15
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Tinkerer): 2 Powers/15 Power Points
Arcane Background (Tinkerer)-1: Critical failure disables device; requires 1 hr and successful Repair to mend
Arcane Background (Tinkerer)-2: Devices given to others use self Repair skill and PP to activate
Construct Familiar: Can communicate w/a magical, Wild Card construct that stores 5 Power Points
Gadgeteer: May jury rig arcane device from available parts
Talisman: -1 casting when talisman is unavailable; critical failure stuns
Tools: Must have tool kit to use Power Modifiers
